text: Soylent Green is a 1973 American science fiction thriller movie directed by Richard Fleischer and loosely based on the 1966 novel Make Room! Make Room!. It stars Charlton Heston, Leigh Taylor-Young, Edward G. Robinson, Joseph Cotten, Brock Peters, Dick Van Patten and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1973 science fiction movies Category:1973 thriller movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Richard Fleischer Category:Dystopian movies
title: Soylent Green
